title: Fix mysql groups and rank keywords
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Fix mysql groups and rank keywords

```sql
-- supported
select t1.groups,t1.rank from t1;

-- not supported
select groups,rank from t1;

-- supported
select `groups`,`rank` from t1;
```
---

title: Move jdbc core META-INF/services/java.sql.Driver from test to main
body:
Based on [DriverManager]( https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/sql/DriverManager.html ), `java.sql.Driver` impl should be included in `META-INF/services/java.sql.Driver`.

Currently, it's included in `test`, so it's not included in released jar (verified on latest `shardingsphere-jdbc-core-5.4.0.jar`).
So when users run `DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:shardingsphere:...")` without `Class.forName(ShardingSphereDriver.class.getName());`, it'll throw `java.sql.SQLException: No suitable driver found ...`. Verified with local compiled jdbc-core in another test project.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Move jdbc core META-INF/services/java.sql.Driver from test to main

---

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.

title: Improve Standalone mode JDBC type impl reset data on initialization
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Update `JDBCRepository.init`, replace `DROP TABLE` to `TRUNCATE TABLE`. To avoid possible `org.h2.jdbc.JdbcSQLSyntaxErrorException: Table "repository" not found (this database is empty); SQL statement:
SELECT value FROM repository WHERE key = ? [42104-214]` error, if several `ShardingSphereDataSource` use default mode.

---
